definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: He explores and meditates about various meaningful questions which are being carried by human beings.
sentences.chinese: 他探求并冥想着作为人类所承载的各种意义问题。

sentences.english: They are groping after the truth.
Destiny, The Inward Quest, Temporality And Life ( Analecta Husserliana Vol. 109 )
sentences.chinese: 命运，内在的探求，暂时性和生活。

sentences.english: Objective To search a better surgical method in the treatment of circular mixed hemorrhoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求更加完善的治疗环状混合痔的手术方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a best operation method of enucleation and plasty of eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求眼球摘除和整形的最佳手术方法。

sentences.english: Therefore, It is necessary to explore the mechanism of stem cell mobilization.
sentences.chinese: 因此，对动员机制的探求也有助于我们对归巢的了解。

sentences.english: Science means the exploration of truth.
The business had no choice but to seek an annulment of the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 企业别无办法，只有探求废除协议的办法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a new method of cranioplasty to repair large-format bone defect.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求一种新的大面积颅骨缺损的修复方法。

sentences.english: When I first started my quest to be happy, everyone was recommending positive thinking.
sentences.chinese: 在我首次开始探求幸福时，人人都建议我积极思考。

sentences.english: And it searched after for an up-to-date developing mentality and research visual angle for study of the nationality culture.
sentences.chinese: 并为民族文化研究探求一条新的发展思路和研究视角。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of transrectal ultrasound(TRUS) in diagnosis of hemospermia .
sentences.chinese: 目的探求经直肠超声检查在血精病因诊断中的价值。

sentences.english: The study about droits protection of the injured party is necessary and urgent.
sentences.chinese: 对被害人权利保护价值的探求必要而迫切。

sentences.english: We will explore these techniques in the next couple of sections.
sentences.chinese: 在下面两个小节中，我们将会探求这些技术手段。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the possibility of nerve regeneration after conduit repair of the intracranial oculomotor nerve in cats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求导管修复颅内段动眼神经的可行性。

sentences.english: The perception of motion-in-depth is still in research.
sentences.chinese: 深度运动知觉问题的研究目前仍处于探求阶段。

definition: to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to trace sth back to its origin
